nodes.name: Schedule Trigger
nodes.notes:
Scheduled for daily at 9:00 AM (0 9 * * *).
Keep disabled until Phase 8 E2E testing is complete.
To activate: Enable this trigger and set workflow to active.

nodes.name: Generate Content
nodes.notes:
Production mode with --dry-run for safety until Phase 8 E2E testing.

To enable full production:
1. Remove --dry-run flag (enables git push)
2. Set GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable for LLM
3. Enable Schedule Trigger
4. Set workflow to active

Error codes returned by script:
- POST_GENERATION_FAILED
- GIT_ADD_FAILED
- GIT_COMMIT_FAILED
- GIT_PUSH_FAILED

nodes.name: Success Complete
nodes.notes:
Success - Post generated and committed.

The post file has been created and (if not --dry-run) committed and pushed to the repository.
GitHub Actions will handle deployment to GitHub Pages.

nodes.name: Error Logged
nodes.notes:
Error - Check n8n executions for details.

Error codes:
- POST_GENERATION_FAILED: LLM or template issue
- GIT_ADD_FAILED: File staging issue
- GIT_COMMIT_FAILED: Commit creation issue
- GIT_PUSH_FAILED: Push to remote issue

Check the error-handler workflow for centralized error logging.
